lead_paragraph: Britain's Queen Elizabeth missed a New Year's Day church service on Sunday due to a heavy cold, Buckingham Palace said, a week after the 90-year-old monarch missed a Christmas Day service for the first time in decades.
snippet: Britain's Queen Elizabeth missed a New Year's Day church service on Sunday due to a heavy cold, Buckingham Palace said, a week after the 90-year-old monarch missed a Christmas Day service for the first time in decades....

headline.main: Britain's Queen Elizabeth Misses Church Again Due to Heavy Cold
headline.print_headline: Britain's Queen Elizabeth Misses Church Again Due to Heavy Cold
